content.rendered:
Naysa Lynch

Sales and Marketing Coordinator

 

Hi, I’m Naysa Lynch. I play a vital role in supporting both teams for smooth operations. My responsibilities encompass collaborating on marketing campaigns, managing digital channels, and aiding in content development. On the sales side, I assist with lead generation, client communications, and provide administrative support to enhance sales efficiency.

 

HOBBIES AND INTERESTS:

Outside of work, I’m a musician at heart, finding joy in sight reading and playing the piano. I’m also passionate about maintaining a healthy lifestyle, spending time at the gym.

 

FAVORITE PLACE:

The Beach, specifically Megan’s Bay Located on St. Thomas, VI, which also happens to be my home.

INSPIRATIONAL QUOTE:

“It doesn’t matter what you have, What matters is what you do with what you have.”
